desc.en: Manually reset the tamper alarm after it has been triggered.
desc.nl: Schakel het sabotage-alarm handmatig uit nadat deze is getriggerd.

instruction.en:
To Add Strips to Your Homey hub

1. Remove both magnets from Strips*
2. The application may ask for the PIN code or the QR code scan. The PIN code is the first five digits of the DSK code

*If you have previously removed the magnets from Strips, or need to re-add the device, performing a manual wake-up will join the device when the controller is in pairing mode

Manual Wake-Up:
1. Place the magnet on the rounded end then remove it and observe the LED blink once
2. Repeat 3 times in 10 seconds

One long LED blink means Strips has been successfully added to your Z-Wave network

Performing a manual wake-up will remove the device when the controller is in un-pairing mode

Manual Wake-Up:
1. Place the magnet on the rounded end then remove it and observe the LED blink once
2. Repeat 3 times in 10 seconds

One long LED blink means Strips has been successfully removed from your Z-Wave network
